Market Research Analyst (Remote) – ADNA (Audience DNA) 
 
About the job 
Are you ready to be part of a team that is at the forefront of market research innovation and is impacting 
business decision-making globally? Join our dynamic team as a Market Research Analyst and contribute in 
shaping the future of insights-driven strategies. 
We are a 4-year-old Singapore-Headquartered fast-growing company with a multinational presence, working 
with leading MNCs, government bodies, and semi-government organizations across industries in multiple 
countries in Asia and beyond. 
 
About the Role 
As an entry level Market Research Analyst, you will be helping execute research/insights projects, collaborating 
with our international team based in various parts of Asia. You will contribute in uncovering key insights on 
both single-country and multi-country research initiatives. From questionnaire design to report preparation, 
you will work across most aspects of our agile research process, ensuring high-quality deliverables and client 
satisfaction. The right person has to be highly motivated, self-directed, self-sufficient with an entrepreneurial 
mindset who is capable of working with agility 
 
What Sets Us Apart 
We are a fast-growing market research startup with a proven track record of success. Our founders have a 
proven track record of building successful companies from scratch, and our work is consistently rated 4.8+/5 
by clients. 
 
Key responsibilities 
• Data Collection & Analysis: 
o Utilize statistical software (e.g., Excel and other simple to learn software) to analyse 
quantitative data 
o Simplify complex data into an easy-to-read format 
• Project Management: 
o Manage the end-to-end project execution, from writing questionnaires to reports 
o Coordinate with internal teams and external vendors to ensure timely project execution  
o Monitor project timelines and quality standards 
• Reporting & Presentation: 
o Organise data into graphs, charts, and other visual aids 
o Write reports that convert data into information 
• Continuous Improvement: 
o Suggest and implement improvements to research processes and tools to enhance efficiency 
and quality 
 
Ideal Candidate Profile: 
• MBA / PGDM in Marketing or Masters in Psychology / Sociology / Statistics / Mathematics / Business 
Studies (no priority on Masters stream among the above) from a well-known university / institution 
• 6+ months of experience in a custom quant research agency would help  
• Can be based anywhere in India 
• Command on MS Excel and MS PowerPoint 
• Data / numbers savvy with an acute attention to detail/accuracy and a strong analytical mindset  
• Ability to thrive in a fast-paced, dynamic startup environment 
• Strong project management skills with the ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously across 
time-zones 
• Excellent communication skills 
• Accountable for designated work in terms of analysis, charting etc and perform quality checks on all 
reports for alignment to request, accuracy, and correctness 
• Highly motivated, self-directed, self-sufficient & entrepreneurial mindset, capable of working with 
agility  • Availability of two reputable references (unrelated to the candidate) 
 
What we offer 
• Competitive salary 
• Opportunities for professional growth and development 
• A collaborative and innovative work environment in a global / multi-national setup 
• The chance to make a significant impact in a growing startup 
 
If you are ready for this exciting opportunity, submit your CV (max 2 pages)  showcasing your skills, attention to 
detail, and commitment to accuracy.

About Us: 
 
Bounteous x Accolite makes the future faster for the world’s most ambitious brands. Our services span 
Strategy, Analytics, Digital Engineering, Cloud, Data & AI, Experience Design, and Marketing. Guided 
by Co-Innovation, our proven methodology of collaborative partnership, we help top global companies 
navigate their most complex challenges, achieve exceptional business impact across Financial 
Services, Restaurant & Convenience, Consumer Goods, Media, Entertainment & Technology, 
Healthcare, Travel & Hospitality, Retail, Industrial & Manufacturing, Logistics and Telecommunications 
industries. 
                                                                                                                                                                               
Bounteous x Accolite brings together 5,000+ employees spanning North America, APAC, and EMEA, 
and partnerships with leading technology providers. Through advanced digital engineering, 
technology solutions, and data -driven digital experiences, we create exceptional and ef ficient 
business impact and help our clients win. 
For more information, please visit www.bounteous.com 
Roles & Responsibilities:  
Role: Assistant Accounts Manager 
Job Description: As an Account Manager, the primary responsibility for this role will be to build and 
maintain positive client relationships, ensuring their needs are met in a mutually sustainable and 
beneficial way. We are looking for professionals who enjoy working with  people, drive client 
satisfaction by facilitating communication, contributing ideas about product differentiation, and 
operating as a liaison between our clients and our company's leaders.  
Responsibilities: 
● Forge and nurture strategic long-term, trusting relationships with clients to achieve organic 
growth and align with long-term company objectives. 
● Educate clients on service/product information including function, specifications, purpose, and 
design advancements. 
● Proactively identify and secure new clients using professional and ethical practices. 
● Provide strategic insights for product improvements, marketing campaigns, and relationship 
management.  
● Collaborate with different teams to identify and champion customer-centric opportunities. 
● Streamline billing, invoicing, and collection activities by employing innovative methods. 
● Develop and deliver insightful reports on account progress, goals, and quarterly initiatives to 
team members, stakeholders, and for potential use in future case studies or company training. 
● Gather, analyze, and communicate customer feedback on service, technology, and product 
delivery.   
 
Qualifications & Requirements:  
● 60% or 6 CGPA throughout with no backlog. 
● 3+ years of industry experience 
● Excellent written, verbal, and presentation skills. 
Location: 
Bangalore/ Chennai/ Gurugram/Hyderabad/ /Mumbai

Are you passionate about being part of an inclusive, diverse and collaborative culture?   Then, this is the right place for you! Welcome to a host of exciting global opportunities in Accenture Technology Strategy & Advisory.  The Practice- A Brief Sketch: The Technology Strategy & Advisory Practice is a part of Accenture Strategy and focuses on our clients’ most strategic priorities. We help clients achieve growth and efficiency through innovative R&D transformation, aimed at redefining business models using agile methodologies. Be part of creating positive change and making the world better for our people, our clients, and the communities where we live and work. We provide you with a great learning ground, deep-rooted in agile strategies, where you will get an opportunity to advice and work with our key global clients, driving end-to-end transformative strategic value and business growth. As a part of this high performing team, these are some of the initiatives you will drive:   Business problem assessment: Identifying, assessing and solving complex business problems where analysis of situations or data requires an in-depth evaluation. Managing Complex deal structures: Mobilization and governance of major change programs from inception to maintenance and leveraging new technologies to drive business value. New business process designs: Designing new business processes based on customer requirements and conducting user review sessions.  Bring your best skills forward to excel in the role: Strong desire to work in technology-driven business transformation Passionate about the technology trends across IT and digital and how they can be applied to companies to address real world problems and opportunities Strong analytical skills, understands complex issues, quickly absorbs information, excels in conceptual and creative problem solving First class written and verbal communication skills; the ability to articulate complex problems and solutions in a simple, logical and impactful manner Exceptional interpersonal and presentation skills - ability to convey technology and business value propositions to senior stakeholders Team oriented and collaborative working style, both with clients and those within the organization. Effective consulting skills Capacity to develop high impact thought leadership that articulates a forward-thinking view of the market Ability to develop and maintain strong internal and client relationships Quickly understand the key value drivers of a business, how they impact the scope and approach of the engagement Natural leadership; the ability to easily establish trust-based relationships and gain valuable insights through collaboration and communication Preferred to have understanding of latest industry tech trends, your role will involve staying ahead of technological advancements and understanding how they impact various industries Flexibility to accommodate client travel requirements  Your experience counts! 0-4 years of consulting experience Understanding of business parameters and drivers and the ability to articulate technology issues in business terms and vice-versa Must possess a blend of analytical, strategic, and research skills to conduct market analysis, support leadership in building Go-to-Market (GTM) strategies, and provide well-analyzed solutions Good working knowledge of one or more of the following:  Digital technology strategy & roadmap development, ecommerce/omni-channel, Digital Enterprise – Enterprise Mobility, Enterprise Analytics, Internet of Things Cloud: Strategy, Security, Assessments and Migration Data/AI: Management, Governance, Architecture, Automation, AI and Gen AI  Enterprise architecture, IT Strategy, IT operating model and IT cost reduction Security: ISMS security and auditing understanding, Risk Management, Security Assessments Transformation Management: Project Management, Stakeholder Management  Knowledge of major technologies (legacy to emerging) Knowledge of and passion for technology trends e.g. Cloud, Digital, Gen AI,5G, Blockchain etc. Capable of building end to end business solutions   Exposure of end-to-end project delivery lifecycle is desirable Excellent presentation skills, strong analytical capabilities and proficiency in leading presentation in front of stakeholders Experience in the one or more of the following industry segments – Banking, Insurance, Capital Markets, Retail, CPG, Healthcare, Lifesciences, Automobile, Telecom, High Tech, Energy and Resources, Manufacturing  Strong interpersonal skills and the right attitude and commitment towards work are essential qualities that we are looking in an analyst  What’s in it for you? An opportunity to work on transformative projects with key G2000 clients  Potential to Co-create with leaders in strategy, industry experts, enterprise function practitioners and, business intelligence professionals to shape and recommend innovative solutions that leverage emerging technologies. Ability to embed responsible business into everything—from how you service your clients to how you operate as a responsible professional.  Personalized training modules to develop your strategy & consulting acumen to grow your skills, industry knowledge and capabilities  Opportunity to thrive in a culture that is committed to accelerate equality for all. Engage in boundaryless collaboration across the entire organization Opportunity to learn and build several Gen AI use cases helping clients to adopt emerging technology and evolve the digital journey.  About Accenture: Accenture is a leading global professional services company, providing a broad range of services and solutions in strategy, consulting, digital, technology and operations. Combining unmatched experience and specialized skills across more than 40 industries and all business functions — underpinned by the world’s largest delivery network — Accenture works at the intersection of business and technology to help clients improve their performance and create sustainable value for their stakeholders. With 730,000 people serving clients in more than 120 countries, Accenture drives innovation to improve the way the world works and lives. Visit us at www.accenture.com  About Accenture Strategy & Consulting: Accenture Strategy shapes our clients’ future, combining deep business insight with the understanding of how technology will impact industry and business models. Our focus on issues such as digital disruption, redefining competitiveness, operating and business models as well as the workforce of the future helps our clients find future value and growth in a digital world. Today, digital is changing the way organizations engage with their employees, business partners, customers and communities. This is our unique differentiator. To bring this global perspective to our clients, Accenture Strategy's services include those provided by our Global Network – a distributed management consulting organization that provides management consulting and strategy expertise across the client lifecycle. Our Global Network teams complement our in-country teams to deliver cutting-edge expertise and measurable value to clients all around the world. For more information visit https://www.accenture.com/us-en/Careers/capability-network   Accenture Global Network  | Accenture in One Word  At the heart of every great change is a great human. If you have ideas, ingenuity and a passion for making a difference, come and be a part of our team. Bachelor’s degree MBA Degree from Tier-1 College (Preferable) Minimum of 9-12 years consulting experience in a consulting environment or at high tech companies Good understanding of business parameters and drivers and the ability to articulate technology issues in business terms and vice-versa Deep experience in one or more of the following:  Tech Strategy – Experience in defining the strategic vision, mission and goals of IT that is aligned with overall business objectives. Infrastructure - Cloud, Applications, Software, Vendor), processes and departments. Experience in IT cost modeling and reporting using various tools (e.g. PowerBI, Apptio etc.). Experience in IT cost transparency, optimization and reduction using techniques such as ZBX, TBM, FinOps etc. Experience in creating and managing IT budgets, forecasts and performing variance analysis.   Agile – Experience in leading enterprise-wide Agile transformations. Experience with one or more Agile development methodologies (i.e., Scrum, XP, Kanban, Lean, etc.), proficient in defining a DevOps roadmap in conjunction with a continuous improvement framework and expert knowledge of the business implications of an Agile Transformation.  Cloud – Experience in Cloud Application and Infrastructure Assessment, Business case, Cloud Architecture and Cloud Deployment. Proficient on one or more cloud platforms – AWS, Azure, Google Cloud Platform, etc. Ability to monitor cloud spending, analyze cloud spending patterns to identify opportunities for cost savings and efficiency improvements. Data – Experience in Data & Analytics Strategy, Data Management & Governance, Modern Data Architecture, Data on cloud, & Data Culture  AI - Experience with Automation, Machine learning and NLP applications. Skilled in assessment, design, architecture, product & tools evaluation for AI implementation Gen AI- Experience in creation of value-driven Gen AI use cases, designing and implementing robust Generative AI architectures, and taking full ownership of the delivery process.  Enterprise Architecture – Experience in digital solution assessment, digital capability, and maturity assessment. Experience in defining technology roadmap aligned with digital strategy. Experience in Enterprise Architecture Strategy, Assessments (including APO/APR), Governance, operating model design and delivery Security – Assessment, Designing & Solutioning Cyber Security solutions. Integration of Security Solutions to the Enterprise systems and with latest technologies like Cloud, IoT etc., Risk Management, experience in Auditing (ISO 27001), NIST CSF, Data Privacy and protection and Cyber Resilience, Securing Gen AI and Gen AI powered Security Transformation Management – Experience of Program management & Governance and the implications of latest technologies on program transformation. Proficient in managing the financials of a program and stakeholder management. Scrum and agile transformation experience. PMP and/or PRINCE2 certification will be an added advantage. Experience in running Value Realization office. Experience in maximizing business value and managing financial operations, especially in the context of technology investments.  Capable of building end to end business solutions Experience in the one or more of the following industry segments – Banking, Insurance, Capital Markets, Retail, CPG, Healthcare, Lifesciences, Automobile, Telecom, High Tech, Energy and Resources, Manufacturing  What’s in it for you? An opportunity to work on transformative projects with key G2000 clients  Potential to Co-create with leaders in strategy, industry experts, enterprise function practitioners and, business intelligence professionals to shape and recommend innovative solutions that leverage emerging technologies. Ability to embed responsible business into everything—from how you service your clients to how you operate as a responsible professional.  Personalized training modules to develop your strategy & consulting acumen to grow your skills, industry knowledge and capabilities  Opportunity to thrive in a culture that is committed to accelerate equality for all. Engage in boundaryless collaboration across the entire organization. Opportunity to learn and build several Gen AI use cases helping clients to adopt emerging technology and evolve the digital journey. text: ADP is hiring a GlobalView – Assistant Manager  Are you empathetic to client needs and inspired by transformation and impacting the lives of millions of people every day? Are you looking to join a dynamic, inclusive team environment with a culture of collaboration and belonging?   Well, this may be the role for you. Ready to design what's next? Global Cloud HR Service market is one of the fastest growing market opportunities today due to increased interest in Cost, Compliance, Resilience, Agility, Privacy and Data Security with 50% of this revenue relating to Multi Country Payroll. As per NelsonHall, the market size is expected to reach $ 10.5B in 2024 from $5.5 B in 2019. ADP is undisputed global leader in providing HR Cloud service across the globe through various service platforms suitable for different client needs. GlobalView Payroll is ADP’s premium cloud based multi-tenant HCM Service platform for large and most complex Multi-National clients. This is one of the fastest growing businesses of ADP that is used by most of the Fortune 500 companies across 44 countries We are looking for Assisant Manager accountable for the team of people delivering payroll for the multinational clients, understand Clients in the Americas / EMEA / Asia Pacific region, their payroll policies / rules documented in the Blueprint (Payroll, Portal and TLM) for ensuring timely and accurate processing of payroll. Go To Person / act as a SME & Consultant for the GlobalView Products, Processes, Country Specific Legislation Knowledge, inbound & outbound interfaces, validate inputs, process Payrolls, validate, reconcile & audit the payroll outputs & post pay reports and resovle queries during or after the payroll.  You will provide payroll delivery advice, demonstrate insightful expertise, help our clients stay compliant, paid on time with 100% accuracy.  Monitor, Track and Manage client issues in Seibel system and work with client and internal partners to classify, prioritize & follow-up. Resolve Seibel system service requests as per agreed SLA Skills and Experience. Ability to multi-tasking and Flexible to working hours and any shift timings. Good organizational and time management skills to drive the team for strictly adhere to the payroll deadlines and manage multiple priorities like Scheduled, Unscheduled Payrolls, Issues Resolution, Escalations Management, Testing Changes in Quality Systems.  Proficiency in Microsoft Office applications, particularly Excel, Word & Powerpoint. Extremely service oriented with a willingness to learn new things. Identify Process vulnerabilities and opportunities for improvement. Independent thinker who is highly motivated and possesses an intrinsic passion for quality.  Maintain confidentiality, process controls and data security standards for all payroll-related information. Stay updated on payroll regulations, tax laws and implementing necessary changes to ensure compliance and best practices.  We're looking for passionate about continuous learning and someone who excels when no two days are the same. Integrity, resilience, and pushing the boundaries are must-haves in this job and willing to apply those learning. Whether you're in meetings with clients or internal department meetings you'll be the guiding voice that helps us clarify ideas so we can support/maintain the Clients already went live and in Production. You love evangelising about your solution and communicate with confidence.   A little about ADP: We are a global leader in HR technology, offering the latest AI and machine learning-enhanced payroll, tax, HR, benefits, and much more. We believe our people make all the difference in cultivating an inclusive, down-to-earth culture that welcomes ideas, encourages innovation, and values belonging. ADP has a deep commitment to diversity, equity, and inclusion as a global Best Places to Work, DiversityInc® Top 50 Company, Best CEO and company for women, LGBTQ+, multicultural talent, and more. Learn more about ADP's commitment on our YouTube channel: http://adp.careers/DEI_Videos  WHAT YOU'LL DO: Here's what you can expect on a typical day:  Payroll Delivery. Responsible team works on process the inputs, validate the output, work with the Clients to obtain the signoff and post validation & audits, deliver all the post pay reports to Clients. Completeness & Correctness are basic expectations with timely delivery. Ticket Management. Responsible team works on issue resolution and clarify the queries which does not require any system changes. Work with Application Support Team for any changes to the Client’s business rules (defect fixing or enhancements to the existing rules/policies) set-up in the system.  Testing Changes. Understand the requirements / system changes and test comprehensively (positive and negative scenarios) in Quality Environment to guarantee changes going to production environment is complete, correct and there won’t be any side effects. Variety of work. There is no typical day. You could be working with technical teams on client experience journeys to delivering new features, collaborating with client teams on the change management planning or engaging with other teams in deciding the optimal services for your clients. Best part? You'll get to see all your ideas come to life.  Presentations. You'll speak to internal and external stakeholders to communicate and defend ideas while answering critical questions.  People Management. Key Responsibilities includes, Performance Management, Hiring, Talent Development, 95% to100% RTO Compliance, 95% to 100% Standout Adoption and Associate Engagement for continous improvement on Talent Retention. A university degree is great but not just enough. What's more important is having the attitude to do the job.  YOU'LL LOVE WORKING HERE BECAUSE YOU CAN: . Deliver at epic scale. We deliver real user outcomes using strong judgment and good instincts. We're obsessed with the art of achieving simplicity with a focus on client happiness and productivity. Be surrounded by curious learners. We align ourselves with other smart people in an environment where we grow and elevate one another to the next level. We encourage our associates to listen, stay agile, and learn from mistakes. Act like an owner & doer. Mission-driven and committed to leading change, you will be encouraged to take on any challenge and solve complex problems. No tasks are beneath or too great for us. We are hands-on and willing to master our craft. Give back to others. Always do the right thing for our clients and our community and humbly give back to the community where we live and work. Support our associates in times of need through ADP's Philanthropic Foundation. Join a company committed to equality and equity.  Our goal is to impact lasting change through our actions.   REQUIRED SKILLS AND COMPETENCIES  Learn and Train Processes, Controls and Products Pasion for learning various countries legislation requirements (policies/ forms, quarter and year end processing) in the Asia Pacific / EMEA / Americas region. Good listening and communication skills. Inclusive team player to be able to understand different point of view and manage conflict in client organization. Work collaboratively with teams spread across geography. Understanding of tools and technology. Paying attention to details. Ability to take ownership and pressure.  Adhere and Comply to processes and procedures. Willingness to work in any shift includes Night Shifts, Very Early Morning Shifts, Morning Shifts and Afternoon Shifts.  CAREER PROGRESSION OPPORTUNITIESk Deputy Manager / Senior Consultant Manager Sr. Manager  Find out why people come to ADP and why they stay: https://youtu.be/ODb8lxBrxrY (ADA version: https://youtu.be/IQjUCA8SOoA )   Diversity, Equity, Inclusion & Equal Employment Opportunity at ADP: ADP affirms inequality is detrimental to our associates, our clients, and the communities we serve. Job Description    Job Summary:   Requires excellent knowledge and experience with project management methodologies to support multi-country payroll implementations. Strong communication and cross-cultural skills to collaborate with the global team members as well as technical knowledge to set up global platform. Responsibilities: He/she is the client's privileged contact in the implementation process, working closely with Celergo's global partners to help the client analyse and implement payroll regulations in accordance with legislation and guarantee the highest level of service.

Perform analysis activities for defining the required technical specifications of the information system that meet the customer configuration needs. In this respect, he/she must conduct the following actions: Conduct global kick off call, create project charters, roll out plan and project plans for all the countries in scope and assuring that all the milestones and timelines are respected by the client and in country partners. Make sure client respects implementation window as per the contract agreement. Make sure all related tools are constantly updated and billing information is accurate so that customers are properly invoiced. Assist with the global implementation process, working closely with Celergo’s global partners. Analysis of the client's organisation (information channel, interface, etc.). Configuration of regulatory settings in the global ADP platform (CGC). Develop, test, and optimize the global solution according to the customer’s specifications; make sure all the steps are followed in the system to allow correct invoicing process. Organize and support meetings with key stakeholders as needed to review project status, discuss, and review issues. Responsible for providing status reporting and providing responsive feedback to management and senior leadership. Provide action plans and issue resolution, as appropriate. Explain payroll (compensation, benefits etc) and its financial implications to clients. Clearly explain country specific payroll issues to clients with the help of the in-country partners. Train clients through online demonstrations using our payroll technology. Serve as a point of contact for client inquiries, invoicing, and fulfilment regarding client-impacting issues throughout implementation. Review Excel documents and verify figures using basic accounting knowledge. Relay pertinent payroll information to our global partners in a timely manner. Excellent verbal and written communication skills as well as strong presentation and interpersonal skills. Ability to work under pressure while maintaining a professional demeanour. Ability to problem - solve and seek alternative solutions. Travel to client location when required.
 Qualifications: To perform this job successfully, an individual must be able to perform each essential duty satisfactorily. The requirements listed below are representative of the knowledge, skill, and/or ability required. Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functions.  Education -- Bachelor’s or Master’s degree from a college or university. Experience – 5-7 years related experience in Payroll Implementation or Processing. Other Skills and Abilities  Bilingual Language skills are preferred. Project management certification a plus Reports & Performance Metrics:  On time delivery of assigned projects Quality control reports Utilisation rate  Training: Implementation process training Product training (CGC platform) Multiple country payroll training

Job Title: Senior Analyst
Top Skills: Basic SqL knowledge ,Exposure to Agile and SCRUM methodologies,

Work Experience:- 12 to 36 Months
Job Description:
The Business Analyst is a key person involved in the complete life cycle of 
development/ implementation. Since business users are not always available when 
needed, the business analyst is often the project team member that fills this void, 
providing the business perspective needed for project success. The Business Analyst 
should design and document workflow and make appropriate recommendations that 
will positively impact operational effectiveness. The Business Analyst will be the 
functional expert on the specified application(s) he/she will be the sole point of contact 
between the business unit and Information Technology’s Application Development 
Specialist. 
Key Responsibilities:
 Identify and define detailed product requirements and use cases
 Develop detailed business processes, requirements, and functional designs
 Maintain strong relationships with clients and project leadership
 Coordinate across multiple teams, subcontractors, and clients
 Support execution of testing
 Develop and review test plans and test cases
 Support development and testing activities across multiple releases
Educational Experience:-
MBA – Finance with B.E/BTech
Prior experience working in financial projects/Banking projects would be 
preferred
What are we looking for: (Good to have)
• Good Analytical and problem-solving skills 
• Experience in SDLC
• Good interest in learning 
• Capital Markets process understanding / experience mandatory 
• Good Understanding of Concepts of Banking / Lending / Deposits / Clearing & Settlement/ 
Payments/ Risk & Regulatory business processes 
• Cost-benefit analysis 
• Business case development  
• Data modelling techniques 
• Excellent written & verbal communication skill with expertise in facilitating team and 
client meetings.  
• Understands how to communicate difficult/sensitive information tactfully. 
• Good client handling experience at the client site. 
• Experience working in large projects collaboratively with teams across time zones 
• Demonstrate delivery skills, excellent communication & interpersonal skills and a go-
getter attitude 
• Should be equipped with understanding with one of the following- Data Analytics, AI/ML, 
Block chain

Market description: 
As a part of Accenture’s RESOURCES Operating Group (one of the fastest growing operating groups within Accenture, with roughly 4.8 bn USD revenue in 2018), our Chemicals industry group works with a wide 
range of industry sub sectors such as Petrochemicals, Polymers and Plastics, Specialty Chemicals, Agrochemicals, Basic & Intermediate Chemicals. This group represented approximately 28% of Resources 
operating group’s net revenues in fiscal 2018 for Accenture.
Chemical Industry Practice within Advanced Technology Centers, India is dedicated to developing assets and offerings to drive innovation for our clients in CNR Industry, using digital and NEW IT technologies. 
Our team has a good mix of deep industry expertise in Chemicals and related industries and next-gen technology skills such as AI, Blockchain, Data Science, Automation, IoT, Digital, BPM and other technologies. 
Our work locations are Mumbai, Bengaluru, Hyderabad, Pune and NCR(national capital region, Gurgaon) locations.
Chemical Industry Practice has created many patent-pending innovations, tangible industry prototypes, technology led proof of concepts, and industry point-of-views; to name a few. Practitioners have also led co-
innovation with multiple clients globally and some of them are currently involved in client-facing innovation-led projects with leading companies in Chemicals space. Within the Chemical industry practice, there are 
several experts dedicated to leading client narrations & CXO storylines, developing and supporting chemical industry specific prototypes & point solutions. We are currently supporting all major global chemical 
clients through rapid innovations, BPM, digital and technology innovation work.

Market description: 
As a part of Accenture’s RESOURCES Operating Group (one of the fastest growing operating groups within Accenture, with roughly 4.8 bn USD revenue in 2018), our Chemicals industry group works with a wide 
range of industry sub sectors such as Petrochemicals, Polymers and Plastics, Specialty Chemicals, Agrochemicals, Basic & Intermediate Chemicals. This group represented approximately 28% of Resources 
operating group’s net revenues in fiscal 2018 for Accenture.
Chemical Industry Practice within Advanced Technology Centers, India is dedicated to developing assets and offerings to drive innovation for our clients in CNR Industry, using digital and NEW IT technologies. 
Our team has a good mix of deep industry expertise in Chemicals and related industries and next-gen technology skills such as AI, Blockchain, Data Science, Automation, IoT, Digital, BPM and other technologies. 
Our work locations are Mumbai, Bengaluru, Hyderabad, Pune and NCR(national capital region, Gurgaon) locations.
Chemical Industry Practice has created many patent-pending innovations, tangible industry prototypes, technology led proof of concepts, and industry point-of-views; to name a few. Practitioners have also led co-
innovation with multiple clients globally and some of them are currently involved in client-facing innovation-led projects with leading companies in Chemicals space. Within the Chemical industry practice, there are 
several experts dedicated to leading client narrations & CXO storylines, developing and supporting chemical industry specific prototypes & point solutions. We are currently supporting all major global chemical 
clients through rapid innovations, BPM, digital and technology innovation work.

Job Description:
The Business Analyst is a key person involved in the complete life cycle of 
development/ implementation. Since business users are not always available when 
needed, the business analyst is often the project team member that fills this void, 
providing the business perspective needed for project success. The Business Analyst 
should design and document workflow and make appropriate recommendations that 
will positively impact operational effectiveness. The Business Analyst will be the 
functional expert on the specified application(s) he/she will be the sole point of contact 
between the business unit and Information Technology’s Application Development 
Specialist.

Identify and define detailed product requirements and use cases

Coordinate across multiple teams, subcontractors, and clients

Support development and testing activities across multiple releases

preferred

client meetings.

getter attitude

Block chain

Market description:
Financial Services has over 20400 resources serving 50+ Banking Clients, 30+ Global Capital Market clients and over 60+ Global Insurance clients with the focus on Application Development, Maintenance 
& Testing across Banking, Capital Markets and Insurance domain, leveraging Intelligent Delivery Tools & Methods.
The Advanced Technology Centre India (ATCi) has about 1000+ Business Analysts working in the Financial Services Industry Practice.
Job Description:
The Business Analyst is a key person involved in the complete life cycle of 
development/ implementation. Since business users are not always available when 
needed, the business analyst is often the project team member that fills this void, 
providing the business perspective needed for project success. The Business Analyst 
should design and document workflow and make appropriate recommendations that 
will positively impact operational effectiveness. The Business Analyst will be the 
functional expert on the specified application(s) he/she will be the sole point of contact 
between the business unit and Information Technology’s Application Development 
Specialist.
Key Responsibilities:
 Identify and define detailed product requirements and use cases
 Develop detailed business processes, requirements, and functional designs
 Maintain strong relationships with clients and project leadership
 Coordinate across multiple teams, subcontractors, and clients
 Support execution of testing
 Develop and review test plans and test cases
 Support development and testing activities across multiple releases
Career level: CL10
Role: Business Analyst
Job Title: Senior Analyst
Top Skills: Experience/Knowledge of Actuarial processes,Knowledge of SQL, latest 
developments in technology, Hands-on experience of RESQ.
Industry Segment: Any
Work Experience: 12 – 36 Months
What are we looking for: (Good to have)
Eliciting business requirements from client -Experience/Knowledge of Actuarial processes
Hands-on experience of RESQ or any similar actuarial/risk/reserving software
Knowledge of SQL, latest developments in technology
Exposure to reinsurance/reserving, risk analytics and/or regulatory requirements for insurance
Exposure and ability to have keen insights into technical issues
Work with project leads to capture scope and vision
Gather requirements via workshops, storyboards, user stories
Document functional requirements, create test scenarios and test cases
Understand business needs-based prioritization of requirements
Analyses requirements for completeness, consistency and validates
Work with technical team for implementation of requirements
Provide support during all phases of SDLC
Education Requirements:
•MBA/PGDM in Insurance/Marketing/Finance
•Prior experience working in financial projects/Insurance projects would be preferred

About Accenture Artificial Intelligence Team : Accenture's Artificial Intelligence team 
focuses on getting machines to do things that we would call intelligent behavior. 
Intelligence whether artificial or otherwise does not have a precise definition, but there 
are many activities and behaviors that are considered intelligent when exhibited by 
humans and animals. Examples include seeing, learning, using tools, understanding 
human speech, reasoning, making good guesses, playing games, and formulating plans 
and objectives. AI team in Accenture Operations focuses on how to get machines or 
computers to perform these same kinds of activities, though not necessarily in the same 
way that humans might do them. 
Job Overview : We are looking for a Product Manager who is enthusiastic about 
building and managing innovative products. This role is a new role in the organization 
and will be key to establishing the Artificial Intelligence product portfolio. 
Focus areas will include establishing product strategy and roadmap, building product 
business case, product backlog management, and effective prioritization to delivery high 
priority features and strategic capabilities. A key part of this role will be to build and 
foster a culture of agility and product ownership in close partnership with technology 
and business teams. 
Main responsibilities :

as business leads, delivery leads and leadership teams, as well as keeping in

range of products in an offering area from concept through maturity and 
eventually to disinvest stage

groomed and prioritized in close collaboration with the business teams   Manage work allocation of product management team, project managers 
supporting project and direct work of development teams and technology teams

the agile transformation of the delivery team

software product requirements 
 Design thinking and innovation is a key component of the role to explore new 
ideas and drive the outcomes quickly 
 Proactively assist the business to identify upcoming conflicts and resource gaps 
 Lead creative brainstorming to improve the quality of AI teams services 
 Track investments and outcomes and report to leadership 
 Own P&L of product portfolio managed 
 Help prioritize resources and investments 
 Drive penetration and growth of product portfolio 
Key Attributes : 
 
 Excellent verbal and written communication skills 
 Strong presentation and persuasion skills 
 Very strong knowledge of product management and development processes 
 Experience working with various development methodologies, e.g. Agile and 
SCRUM, and process workflow across organizations 
 High degree of competency in all phases of project management, including issue 
and risk identification and management; change management; tracking 
dependencies and milestones; and communicating overall project status 
 Demonstrated ability to effectively establish and maintain working relationships 
with all levels of the organization 
 Demonstrated analysis and innovative problem-solving skills 
 Experience working in matrix, multi-functional teams comprised of Program 
Managers, Product Managers, Developers, and business owners 
 Solid understanding of technical platforms, and internal and 3rd party interfaces 
 Strong interest in being aware of and ability to apply new technologies 
Education : Master's Degree in Management, Computer Science, Mathematics, 
Physical Sciences, Engineering, Information Technology, or related field. 
Core Competencies :

 Design and Development in large scale responsive web applications. / backend 
system (Relational and/or document based, big data is plus) 
 Good understanding of Cloud computing and Artificial Intelligence APIs 
 Experience guiding development teams  Preference : 
 Minimum 5+ years in a Top Tier Technology organization / Top tier Consulting 
firm / Product management environment 
 Strong written and verbal communication skills

Job Description:  Position Overview: The Client-Facing Business Analyst serves as a key liaison between our clients and internal teams. You will collaborate with clients to comprehend their business objectives, analyze processes, and propose data-driven solutions. Your work will enable our clients to make informed decisions and drive business growth.  Key Responsibilities:  Client Engagement: Cultivate strong client relationships, acting as the primary point of contact for business analysis and requirement gathering. Business Analysis: Perform in-depth analysis of client requirements, business processes, and data to identify opportunities for improvement and growth. Requirements Elicitation: Gather and document detailed business requirements, translating them into functional and technical specifications for implementation through the engineering team. Data Analysis: Analyze data from various sources to derive valuable insights and support data-informed decision-making. Solution Development: Collaborate closely with clients to develop and recommend practical and innovative solutions to address business challenges. Business Process Enhancement: Identify and implement process improvements, workflow optimizations, and best practices to streamline operations. Documentation: Prepare comprehensive and clear documentation, including business process maps, user stories, and system requirements. Collaboration: Work in close partnership with cross-functional teams, such as developers, project managers, and client relationship managers, to ensure the successful delivery of projects.  Qualifications:  Bachelor of Technology or Bachelor of Engineering Pre-MBA experience of a minimum of 12 months Exceptional communication skills, with the ability to bridge the gap between technical and non-technical stakeholders. Familiarity with project management methodologies (e.g., Agile, Scrum) is a plus. Knowledge of data analysis and visualization tools (e.g., Excel, Tableau) is advantageous. Strong problem-solving and critical thinking abilities, focusing on practical solutions. Client-centered mindset with a strong commitment to delivering exceptional service. Detail-oriented, with a high degree of accuracy in work.

Marketing Analytics Advisory Team Executive JD 
The Marketing Analytics Advisory team works on building and deploying Analytics and Data-driven solutions 
and initiatives for clients to deliver business impact and superior client value 
Job Responsibility 
       Manage strategic marketing analytics engagements -across digital marketing, customer analytics & 
social media 
       Manage client relationship, shape analytics roadmap, manage execution of the initiatives and deliver 
business outcomes 
       Deliver projects using advanced analytics and machine learning techniques like 
segmentation/clustering, recommendation engines, propensity models etc. to help clients drive better 
business outcomes, including improved user growth and revenue, enhanced marketing ROI, increased 
brand equity etc. 
       Drive thought leadership and prospect new ways of applying digital analytics to make a business 
impact for clients. 
       Lead and manage multi-functional teams to help clients evolve to data-driven marketing organizations 
       Develop deep functional & industry expertise 
  
Candidate Profile 
       7- 10 years' experience in digital or customer marketing, or digital analytics leadership with exposure 
to international clients 
       Experience in Marketing ROI measurement techniques like marketing mix model, experimentation etc.

technologies, such as web analytics, experimentation, CRM, analytics implementation, campaigns and 
media, social media etc. 
       Must have intermediate level understanding in Power BI, SQL, R, and/or Python and various 
modeling techniques. 
       Working knowledge of Adobe/Google Analytics/GTM

  Job Description- CL 8 
ABOUT THE ROLE   
• Accenture’s Business Transformation team is the driver of Digital & Process transformation with a focus on 
technology and domain led innovative solutions to drive significant business outcomes for our clients  
• The focus is to power the Intelligent Operations journey by combining data, technology, people, and 
intelligence to enable decision-making, drive agility and unlock business outcomes at speed and scale  
• The team has expanded significantly over the last couple of years and adding new solutions and emerging 
technologies in its umbrella of services and we are looking for dynamic leaders who think out of the box 
while seamlessly working with cross-functional teams  
 
 
Key Responsibilities:  
Responsible for managing the Finance and Accounting Transformation  
Business Transformation Associate Manager 
• Evangelize Business Transformation solutions for clients for their retained and outsourced organization  
• Creating customer engaging solutions focusing on end-to-end transformation, resulting in “Future Ready” 
Operations  
• Maintain a strong pipeline of proposals through enhanced stakeholder experience and delivering business 
outcomes  
• Accelerate the journey to digital, data-driven, intelligent operations by bringing together the best 
innovative digital technologies, process, and industry expertise  
• Draw data and insights from client engagement, industry, and business process expertise  
• Create end to end Value stream mapping, Customer Journey mapping 
• Engagement with client senior leadership focused on Transformation Roadmap creation, Target operating 
model and Optimizing Tactical Value  
• Engage with clients on driving Automation as a strategic enabler and conveying the components of RPA & 
Cognition (AL/ML), ecosystem around organization structure, governance model, RACI matrix, roles 
required, evaluation matrix for processes and enabling integration with BPM, platforms and other point 
solutions  
• Undertake due-diligence process and work as a trusted advisory to internal and external stakeholder on 
building an ecosystem of data mining and transformation  
• Drive Work Orchestration through Intelligent Finance, Flexible Operating Models and Automated & Agile 
Workforce   • Evangelising solutions in Finance and Accounting while working with multiple team’s within Accenture’s 
digital eco system and partners and bringing them to life in demos & innovations labs  
• Should have good understanding of commercial structures of transformation proposals and impact on P&L  
PERFORMANCE MEASURES:  
• Generating healthy pipeline of Business Transformation proposals for existing accounts or new accounts  
• Customer engagement and RFX support within stipulated timeframe  
• Steady movement of Transformation assets and Client Value Meter in all existing accounts  
• Captives and retained organization productivity improvement & working capital optimization 
 
 
 
 
QUALIFICATION: 
• Bachelor’s degree and MBA from a premier institute  
• > 8-10 years of Strong experience in operations, consulting and digital transformation solutions focused on 
Finance and Accounting: Record to Report/ Order to Cash/ Procure to Pay areas  
• Consulting Experience dealing with CXO-2 on the client side with strong focus on billability and outcomes  
• Lean six sigma black belt/ green belt trained. Certifications would be preferred  
 
 
KNOWLEDGE & SKILLS: 
• We are looking for Thought Leaders with hands experience and sound understanding of:  
o Order to Cash business including upstream and downstream processes from Sales initiation to 
Order validation & delivery thereafter. Focus is more on B2B processes  
o Record to report processes and the impact on it from upstream processes  
o Procure to pay processes from indexing to payment  
o Strong ERP functional skills with an understanding of SAP/Oracle to adapt processes to enable 
efficient functioning and avoid bolt on automations  
• Strong experience in Value Stream mapping, customer Journey mapping. Should have an end to end 
problem solving approach  • Ability to identify automation/improvement opportunities and create automation/transformation 
roadmap, govern and manage end to end 
• Well versed with Industry proven technologies & leading tools, automation, AI, and Analytics plus have a 
proven track record of implementing digital solutions  
• Should have delivered mid/large scale end-end Process Transformation projects for global clients  
• Hold conversations with CXO -2, lead solution defense and manage ambiguous client situations  
• Excellent Communication skills, result-oriented, self-driven person with a high energy level, analytical and 
structured with extensive experience in managing a high-performance team and delivering large scale 
Transformation project.  
• Drive rigorous metrics related to the Balance Score Card to evaluate performance and drive reduction in 
variability/defects in critical business processes  
• People management skills  
 
 
ROLE IMPORTANCE: 
• Designed to take the Accenture Operations Digital Transformation story to the Client’s retained 
organization as well as create newer avenues of Platform based transformation solutions  
• Brings design thinking to the way we run our operations and how can the upstream and downstream 
processes be combined in our overall transformation roadmap while we drive buy in from the client 
stakeholders  
• Expected to unlock the potential of white spaces in the overall Business Transformation Journey of our 
client’s operations, thereby exploring opportunities of new asset creations, third party product 
partnerships and a co-creation concept approval from the clients  
 
PERSONAL ATTRIBUTES : 
• Self-driven, go-getter, with ability to work on limited inputs.  
• Comfortable with unstructured responsibilities  
• Creative problem solving, analytical skill set 
• Adaptable to change and drive the change mindset with stakeholders

Where Ideas Meet Impact: Your Product Journey Starts Here  Are you ready to embark on a journey where your passion for building products meets real-world impact? At Altimetrik, we’re looking for dynamic, forward-thinking individuals with  2 years of experience to join our team as Product Analysts. If you’ve ever imagined crafting solutions that directly inﬂuence business success, this is your chance.  What You’ll Do:  • Dive deep into customer conversations to understand their needs and transform them into actionable product concepts. • Partner with business and product engineering  teams to create functional workﬂows that makes the future visible • Be at the heart of the discussions, bringing clarity and direction to ensure top-notch deliverables and engaging product demos before launches.  Collaborate, Innovate, Lead:  • Work alongside product managers to derive insights that drive decisions. • Act as the bridge between business, product  and engineering teams, ensuring every story is prioritized and development-ready.  Your Skills:  • Adapt quickly, thrive under pressure, and think outside the box in dynamic environments. • Communicate your ideas with structure, build rapport with stakeholders, and leave a lasting impact with every interaction. • Embrace technology with enthusiasm and deliver nothing less than excellence.  Why Us?   We’re not just building products; we’re solving real-world business problems. You’ll work on projects with purpose, sharpen your skills, and contribute to a culture that values innovation, collaboration, and impact.  Ready to drive change and shape the future of products? Let’s create something extraordinary together.
